CatDescriptText: Mr. Thomas Gordon, shoestore owner, 2200 Centre Avenue, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 3, 1959, pg. A1 with question: "Who do you think is responsible for the failure to pass effective civil rights legislation in Congress?"  Answer reads: "The Southern bloc and perhaps the main reason why is that the members are narrow minded."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Thomas Gordon, standing in front of car parked on street, automobiles and buildings in background
